anya-e0105n17:1_0: Punapi rājā dakkhiṇārāmavāsimhi jimhamānase kuhakatissatthere pasanno hutvā tassatthāya mahāvihārasīmabbhantare
anya-e0105n17:1_2: Mahāvihāravāsino bhikkhū taṁ nivāretuṁ asakkontā punapi tato apakkamiṁsu.
anya-e0105n17:1_3: Tadāpi mahāvihāro nava māsāni bhikkhūhi suñño ahosi.
anya-e0105n17:1_4: Rājā pana attano ajjhāsayavaseneva tattha jetavanavihāraṁ kāretvā tassa kuhakatissattherassa adāsiyeva.
anya-e0105n17:1_5: Tattha dakkhiṇagirivihārato sāgaliyā bhikkhū āgantvā vasiṁsu.
anya-e0105n17:1_6: Pacchā ca te ambasāmaṇerasilākālarañño kāle (1067-1080-bu-va) vetullavādino ahesuṁ mahāvaṁse 37,
anya-e0105n17:2_3: Tesu pana abhayagirivāsinoyeva visesato pākaṭā ceva honti balavanto ca.
anya-e0105n17:2_4: Tathā hi te visuddhattheravādapiṭakañca vajjiputtakapariyāpannadhammarucinikāyapiṭakañca mahisāsakādinikāyapiṭakañca mahāyānapiṭakañca sampaṭicchanti.
anya-e0105n17:2_6: Mahisāsakādinikāyapiṭakassa sampaṭicchitabhāvo pana phāhiyannāmassa cinabhikkhuno addhānakkamasallakkhaṇakathāya
